results.title: Beneficial actions of amlodipine in the multiple-stunned canine myocardium.
results.text_hl: Beneficial actions of @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ in the multiple-@<m>DISEASE_Myocardial_Stunning</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017682 @@@stunned@@@ canine myocardium.

results.title: Randomized, double-blind crossover study to investigate the effects of amlodipine and isosorbide mononitrate on the time course and severity of exercise-induced myocardial stunning.
results.text_hl: The global and segmental stress echocardiography parameters of @<m>DISEASE_Myocardial_Stunning</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017682 @@@stunning@@@ were attenuated in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ while taking @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ compared with ISMN.

citations.NLM: Rinaldi CA, Linka AZ, Masani ND, Avery PG, Jones E, Saunders H, Hall RJ. results.title: Vascular and myocardial effects of amlodipine: an overview.
results.text_hl: When administered intravenously (0.25 mg/kg) 5 h before hearts were excised and made globally @DISEASE_Optic_Neuropathy_Ischemic @DISEASE_MESH:D018917 @@@ischaemic@@@ for short periods (the '@<m>DISEASE_Myocardial_Stunning</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017682 @@@stunned@@@' heart) @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ pretreatment improved functional recovery associated with reperfusion.

citations.NLM: Nayler WG, Gu XH. Vascular and myocardial effects of amlodipine: an overview. Postgrad Med J. 1991;67 Suppl 5():S41-3. PMID: 1839439
citations.BibTeX: @article{1839439, title={Vascular and myocardial effects of amlodipine: an overview.}, author={Nayler WG and Gu XH}, journal={Postgrad Med J}, volume={67 Suppl 5}, pages={S41-3}}

results.title: The pharmacological profile of amlodipine in relation to ischaemic heart disease.
results.text_hl: Results obtained from studies involving ischaemic/reperfused @SPECIES_10116 @@@rat@@@, @SPECIES_9685 @@@cat@@@ and @SPECIES_9615 @@@dog@@@ hearts showed that @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ had a protective effect on the @<m>DISEASE_Myocardial_Stunning</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017682 @@@ischaemic myocardium@@@.

citations.NLM: Burges RA. The pharmacological profile of amlodipine in relation to ischaemic heart disease. Postgrad Med J. 1991;67 Suppl 3():S9-15. PMID: 1836872
citations.BibTeX: @article{1836872, title={The pharmacological profile of amlodipine in relation to ischaemic heart disease.}, author={Burges RA}, journal={Postgrad Med J}, volume={67 Suppl 3}, pages={S9-15}}

results.title: Effects of amlodipine on myocardial ischemia-reperfusion injury in dogs.
results.text_hl: These results suggest that @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ has a favorable effect on the functional and metabolic recovery of the @DISEASE_Brain_Ischemia @DISEASE_MESH:D002545 @@@ischemic@@@ reperfused @<m>DISEASE_Myocardial_Stunning</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017682 @@@myocardium@@@ and may have potential as a therapeutic agent for the treatment of @DISEASE_Coronary_Artery_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D003324 @@@coronary artery disease@@@.

citations.NLM: Gross GJ, Farber NE, Pieper GM. Effects of amlodipine on myocardial ischemia-reperfusion injury in dogs. Am J Cardiol. 1989 Nov 7;64(17):94I-100I. PMID: 2530891
citations.BibTeX: @article{2530891, title={Effects of amlodipine on myocardial ischemia-reperfusion injury in dogs.}, author={Gross GJ and Farber NE and Pieper GM}, journal={Am J Cardiol}, volume={64}, number={17}, pages={94I-100I}}

results.title: Amlodipine in ischaemic left ventricular dysfunction with mild to moderate heart failure.
results.text_hl: Among other calcium antagonists, @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ does not adversely affect the clinical status of @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@.

citations.NLM: Perna GP, Valle G, Cianfrone N, Luca GD, Amico C, Coli C. Amlodipine in ischaemic left ventricular dysfunction with mild to moderate heart failure. Clin Drug Investig. 1998;16(4):289-96. PMID: 18370550

results.title: The effect of amlodipine on hypertension-induced cardiac hypertrophy and reperfusion-induced calcium overload.
results.text_hl: This same @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ regimen (10 mg kg-1 day-1 orally) or @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ i.v. (0.25 mg/kg, 5 h before excising the hearts) improved functional recovery (p less than 0.01) of hearts "@<m>DISEASE_Myocardial_Stunning</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017682 @@@stunned@@@" by 10 min @DISEASE_Ischemia @DISEASE_MESH:D007511 @@@ischemia@@@ and attenuated (p less than 0.05) @CHEMICAL_Calcium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002118 @@@calcium@@@ ion gain on reperfusion after 30 to 60 min @DISEASE_Ischemia @DISEASE_MESH:D007511 @@@ischemia@@@.

citations.NLM: Nayler WG. The effect of amlodipine on hypertension-induced cardiac hypertrophy and reperfusion-induced calcium overload. J Cardiovasc Pharmacol. 1988;12 Suppl 7():S42-4. PMID: 2467127
